title: Hide IP
content:

comments.content:
I think you have to become an Uppercase Member of Typophile to have the ability to hide IP. Also, I think you have to install both Comic Sans and Hobo on your system to hide IP.

—  
Mike

Unless you’re doing something illegal, there’s no real reason to hide your ip. It won’t protect you from viruses or spam or anything like that. The only ppl that can connect you to your ip is your isp.

So don’t worry about it...

I’d simply point out here that reasonable  
human behavior is quite often “illegal”...
